sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Network Service Request - New Service">670690da1bf5f110824752c1604bcbe7</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:14859d491b5e3114824752c1604bcbda</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onChange WAN Request - Show HA option</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	if (newValue == 'true') {
		g_form.setDisplay('request_ha', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('request_ha', false);
	}
	else {
		g_form.setValue('request_ha', newValue);
		g_form.setDisplay('request_ha', false);
		g_form.setValue('service_definition', '');
		g_form.setValue('service_code', '');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wbbusby</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-04 14:49:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e9ab9e131bfab510824752c1604bcb28</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChange WAN Request - Show HA option</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NS Pro" source="x_g_sonc_ns_pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NS Pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e9ab9e131bfab510824752c1604bcb28</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-04 14:56:10</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
